pr_title: HDDS-3221. Refactor SafeModeHandler to use a Notification Interface

timeline.message: Refactor interfaced used by SafeModeHandler to notiy objects when the safemode state changes
Change the constructor of the SafeModeHandler

timeline.bodyText: NIT: Can we rename this to as SafeModeNotification. As the classes which need to receive this notification will implement them. Instead of specifying Transition in the name of the interface. Thoughts?
